mapper.select: select user_sid, user_id, username, email, password, role, plan_id, is_active, created_at, updated_at from users where lower(email) = lower(#{email})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password, role, plan_id, is_active) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role}, #{planId}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET plan_id = #{planId}, updated_at = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
